testcase.classname: Test lightweight to-do list webapp Functionality.
testcase.name: 01. Verify that user is able to launch To do list application successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User launch given lightweight to-do list webapp.......................passed Then Verify the webapp home page............................................passed

testcase.classname: Test lightweight to-do list webapp Functionality.
testcase.name: 02. Verify that user is able to add a task successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User launch given lightweight to-do list webapp.......................passed When Verify the webapp home page............................................passed Then User add a "item_1" to todo list.......................................passed And Verify the "item_1" is successfully added to todo list..................passed

testcase.classname: Test lightweight to-do list webapp Functionality.
testcase.name: 03. Verify that user is able to close a task by pressing X button
testcase.system-out: Given User launch given lightweight to-do list webapp.......................passed And Verify the webapp home page.............................................passed And User add three tasks to todo list.......................................passed When User closes one task...................................................passed Then the total count of incomplete tasks should be two......................passed

testcase.classname: Test lightweight to-do list webapp Functionality.
testcase.name: 04. Verify that user is able to mark or un mark a task a completed
testcase.system-out: Given User launch given lightweight to-do list webapp.......................passed And Verify the webapp home page.............................................passed And User add three tasks to todo list.......................................passed When User markes one task...................................................passed Then the total count of incomplete tasks should be two......................passed When User un markes one task................................................passed Then the total count of incomplete tasks should be three....................passed

testcase.classname: Test lightweight to-do list webapp Functionality.
testcase.name: 05. Verify that User should get an error whern Accessing an invalid URL
testcase.system-out: Given the user attempts to access an invalid URL like "https://todomvc.com/examples/angular3/".passed Then the user should be redirected to an error page or a 404 page not found.passed

testcase.classname: Test lightweight to-do list webapp Functionality.
testcase.name: 06. Verify that user should not be able to add a empty task
testcase.system-out: Given User launch given lightweight to-do list webapp.......................passed And Verify the webapp home page.............................................passed And User try to add empty task..............................................passed Then user should not be able to add empty task..............................passed

testcase.classname: Test lightweight to-do list webapp Functionality.
testcase.name: 07. Verify that when user try to edit an existing task with empty value then user should be getting an error message
testcase.system-out: Given User launch given lightweight to-do list webapp.......................passed And Verify the webapp home page.............................................passed And User add a "task 1" to todo list........................................passed And User edits the existing task with empty string..........................passed Then User should be getting an error message................................passed

testcase.classname: Test lightweight to-do list webapp Functionality.
testcase.name: 08. Verify that when user try to add a task with leading spaces then application should add the task by removing all leading and trailing spaces
testcase.system-out: Given User launch given lightweight to-do list webapp.......................passed And Verify the webapp home page.............................................passed And User add a " task_1 " to todo list..............................passed Then User should be able to add the task by removing leading and traling spaces.passed
